Text: Master Agreement between Enron North America Corp and Duke Energy Trading and Marketing LLC Cc Hello Debra As you know Duke Energy Trading and Marketing LLC DETM and Enron North America Corp ENA are operating under a GISB Base Contract dated December which covers all of our companies spot transactions However we still need a contract to cover our companies term transactions Accordingly DETM has reviewed ENAs standard master agreement and has some proposed revisions to this document attached is a redlined agreement which reflects DETMs requested changes Please review DETMs changes to ENAs agreement and let me know if they are acceptable We would like to execute this agreement as soon as possible since we currently do not have an agreement that covers our term transactions so your immediate attention to this matter is appreciated Thank you for your assistance Julie Roberts Phone Fax See attached file Enron Contract as of October doc Enron Contract as of October doc
